CONNECTIVE_VULNERABILITY.definition: Revealing sensitive information or weakness to deepen trust.
CONNECTIVE_VULNERABILITY.description: High-risk disclosure requires high safety. Validates the relational container.

CONNECTIVE_AFFECTION.definition: Expression of care, love, or positive regard.

PROTECTIVE_BOUNDARY.definition: Establishing limits to maintain safety or integrity.
PROTECTIVE_BOUNDARY.description: Healthy assertion of self. Neutral trust impact, high agency.

ADVERSARIAL_COERCION.definition: Using force, insults, or threats to override will.
ADVERSARIAL_COERCION.description: Active violation of autonomy. Creates hazard.

ADVERSARIAL_BETRAYAL.definition: Violation of established contract or trust.

EXPLORATORY_PLAY.definition: Testing boundaries or dynamics through humor/challenge.

ATTACHMENT_GRIEF.definition: Response to loss of valued attachment.
ATTACHMENT_GRIEF.description: Vulnerability that signals high valuation of the bond.
